pagination test:
a pagination test; the demo lets you select a word for it to spell out. this was the first command made for variant `giggle-bot`

`pag[e|ination]test`
use this channel:
sets the channel for where an external echo should go

`usethischannel`
echo(c)(x)(s)(e): message:
sends what you sent.
**flags**
c - put the message in a code block
x - sends the message to a different channel set by the `use this channel` command
s - doesn't trim the whitespace after the colon
e - puts the message in an embed (something that only bots can post)

`echo(c)(x)(s)(e):` (there must be at least a non-whitespace character after the colon)
@moofy-bot delete 10:
takes the 10 latest messages and deletes the ones that are from the bot

mention + `delete[<nonnegative number>]`
@moofy-bot react [emoji]:
reacts the emoji (unless it's a custom one, or if it's thumbs up/down) on a message. you can set the message by reacting TREE on it (for some reason it doesn't work if the message existed before the bot restarted)

mention + `react[emoji]` (only unicode (not custom) emojis that are supported on Discord are allowed; the bot doesn't know if the reaction works, so don't be suprised if nothing appears; it might just be )
inspect emoji:
opens up an emoji inspector that inspects the emoji from a reaction

`inspectemoji`
pick a random number between 1 and 10:
picks a number between the given range

`(pick)(a)rand(om)num(ber)(d'|from|between)[<nonnegative integer>](-|to|t'|&|and|n')[<nonnegative integer>]`
actually pick a random number between 1:
picks a *random* number between the given range

`actually(pick)(a)rand(om)num(ber)(d'|from|between)[<nonnegative integer>](-|to|t'|&|and|n')[<nonnegative integer>]`
my bcbw:
tells you how much bitcoin but worse (BCBW) you have

`my[money|bcbw]`
@person's bcbw:
tells you how much bitcoin but worse (BCBW) the given person has

`[<user mention>]('s)[money|bcbw]`
my name is Bob:
sets your nickname to Bob so that in the future it doesn't mention spam you whenever someone else wants to know how much money you have or whatever

`myname('s|is) [<name>]` (the rest of the message will be part of your name)
give @person 123 bcbw:
gives the bitcoin but worse (BCBW) to the given person

`give[<user mention>][<nonnegative integer>][money|bcbw]`
@person's inventory:
shows you the given person's inventory's contents

`[<user mention>]('s)inv(entory)`
my daily:
get your daily `500` bitcoin but worse (BCBW)

`mydaily`
I want to mine:
makes you mine and earn some bitcoin but worse (BCBW). requires a pickaxe. we cannot guarantee the survival of the pickaxe

`iwanttomine`
@moofy-bot GAME:
starts a game with moofy-bot that can earn you some bitcoin but worse (BCBW)

`hint 3` allows you to buy the third letter
`cancel` cancels the game

mention + `GAME` (it must be in all caps)
@moofy-bot profiles:
lists profiles that have a bitcoin but worse (BCBW) account

mention + `profile(s)`
@moofy-bot leaderboard: lists the people with the most bitcoin but worse (BCBW)
exchange 1000 bcbw to democoin: converts the given amount of bitcoin but worse (BCBW) to DemoCoin
